examples: This piano wants the attention of a competent tuner

results.definition: anything that is necessary but lacking
examples: I tried to supply his wants

results.definition: the state of needing something that is absent or unavailable
examples: for want of a nail the shoe was lost

results.definition: feel or have a desire for; want strongly
examples: I want to go home now

results.definition: be without, lack; be deficient in
examples: want the strength to go on living
flood victims wanting food and shelter

results.definition: hunt or look for; want for a particular reason
examples: Your former neighbor is wanted by the FBI

results.definition: wish or demand the presence of
examples: I want you here at noon!
